title: USA Mix Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Discover Lost Mary Tappo pre-filled replacement pods, available in packs of 2. Each pod contains 2ml of 20mg nic salt vape liquid & lasts up to 600 puffs. Indulge your senses with the Lost Mary Tappo USA Mix Pre-filled Replacement Pods; a silky smooth American tobacco blend with creamy undertones. Each pack contains 2 pre-filled pods filled with 20mg (2%) nic salt e-liquid and has been designed for exclusive use with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary . These pre-filled replacement pods last for approximately 600 puffs before they need to be replaced, making them a cheap alternative for those looking to stop using Disposable Vapes. The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods come in 15 different flavours, the same flavours as the popular BM600 Disposable Vapes . Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Flavours: Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour: Tobacco Capacity: 2ml Nicotine Strength: 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type: Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo USA Mix Pre-filled Replacement Pods
